tasks: Maintaining a web based Exchange system with Laravel Framework.
Integrated payment gateway APIs to manage fiat deposit and withdrawal flows.
Integrated external custody APIs for managing crypto asset operations including deposit address generation, balance tracking, and withdrawal execution.
Integrated Laravelâ€™s job and queue system (backed by Redis) to support a custom-built matching engine for buy/sell order execution.
Utilized Laravel Horizon for monitoring queued jobs and background processing.
Implemented client-side interactivity using jQuery AJAX for real-time trading interactions.

Integrated regulatory APIs include Indonesian Coin Custodian (ICC) for handling crypto asset transactions, Komisi Kliring Indonesia (KKI) for fiat currency transaction compliance, and Central Financial X (CFX) for trade lifecycle processing and regulatory reporting.
I upgraded a web based E-Commerce with Opencart framework.

The website i created is an online shopping platform for Galeri Medika's customers, equipped with social login capabilities, a reliable courier delivery system, and a secure payment processing system.
Develop an internal apps in Galeri Medika with Odoo Framework.

In Galeri Medika's internal applications, I developed custom modules using Odoo, including a Doctor Scheduling System to manage and display doctor availability across Tangerang and South Tangerang, as well as a Courier Handover Module that ensures package verification before being handed over to couriers based on invoice details.
I built a human resource management web based app with Laravel framework with Livewire.
My human resource management web application is used to manage employee tasks, which is able to manage order process and be able to monitor the order processing process for staff.
I teach Database Management System to fellow students here at ITT Purwokerto.
During teaching, there are a lot of experiences gained, one of which can help other students in learning about database management systems, and practicing leadership for myself.
